description: Try our easy to follow Thai Red Curry Prawn Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Thai Red Curry Prawn Noodle Soup
name: Thai Red Curry Prawn Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain noodles and divide among bowls. Spoon over soup and top with bean sprouts and coriander leaves. Serve with lime wedges.
